extracted_text:
On August 22, 2025, Reliance Industries announced that its step-down subsidiary, Nauyaan Tradings Private Limited (NTPL), had completed the acquisition of a 6.1% equity stake in Nauyaan Shipyard Private Limited (NSPL) from Welspun Corp Limited for ₹45.32 crore .

Key details of the corporate development include:

With this final purchase, NSPL became a wholly-owned step-down subsidiary of Reliance Industries.

The transaction is not a related party transaction.

The acquisition aligns with Reliance's strategy to expand its presence in the maritime industry.

Reliance disclosed this information to stock exchanges on the same day as required by regulatory obligations.
